name: Quarticon
description: AI-based tool which makes your online shop display products tailored to each customer’s individual needs, expectations and interests.
author: Quarticon S.A

shortDescription.de: KI-basiertes Tool, mit dem Ihr Online-Shop Produkte anzeigt, die auf die individuellen Bedürfnisse, Erwartungen und Interessen jedes Kunden zugeschnitten sind.
shortDescription.en: AI-based tool which makes your online shop display products tailored to each customer’s individual needs, expectations and interests.
